pkgmetadata.longdescription: libAfterImage is a generic image manipulation library. It was initially implemented to address AfterStep Window Manager's needs for image handling, but it evolved into software suitable for project that has needs for handling images. Most of the popular image formats are supported using standard libraries, with XCF, XPM, PPM/PNM, BMP, ICO, TGA and GIF being supported internally. PNG, JPEG and TIFF formats are supported via standard libraries. Text rendering capabilities included, providing support for TrueType fonts using FreeType library, and anti-aliasing of standard fonts from X window system.
